data.title: The College of Health Care Professions
data.meta_description: Since 1988, CHCP has been helping students get started in allied healthcare careers. Learn how we can help you obtain a degree or certification in Texas or online today!
data.text:
Find the Right Healthcare Program for You

By submitting this form, you give CHCP your consent to be contacted by a variety of methods including phone (both mobile or home, dialed manually or automatically), email, mail, and text message.

Expand

Are you ready to advance your Future and Career?

CHCP's Medical Assistant Programs provide hands-on training in clinical and administrative skills crucial for assisting physicians, nurses, and patients.

Our 36-week medical assistant program features multiple class schedule options at campus locations across Texas and Online. Class schedule options include one-day, two-day, night, and online classes. Get started today!

Start Your Application
